selectedVerses.text: When she rouses herself to flee, she laughs at the horse and his rider.
Dan shall be a serpent in the way, a viper by the path, that bites the horse's heels so that his rider falls backward.
At your rebuke, O God of Jacob, both rider and horse lay stunned.
And Miriam sang to them: "Sing to the LORD, for he has triumphed gloriously; the horse and his rider he has thrown into the sea."
And out came another horse, bright red. Its rider was permitted to take peace from the earth, so that men should slay one another, and he was given a great sword.
